file_content.text: They are here.
Who? What are you talking about?
Ah. Lord Scourge and the Jedi who defied the Emperor. I'm surprised to see you here.
Ah. The Emperor's lost child and the Jedi who defied his will. I'm surprised to see you here.
Ah. The Jedi who defied the Emperor. I'm surprised to see you here.
Did you really think I'd sit by and let you destroy Voss?
You shouldn't be.
Valen-Da told me where to find you.
The Mystic showed me the way.
Surprised! Maybe when I start slicing you to pieces you'll have a more appropriate reaction.
You should be afraid.
Where is Tala-Reh? She is part of my vision, too.
I am here, honored one.
Betrayed. The Mystic. The avatar destroyer. Rend their flesh. Complete the ritual! Unleash the plague!
Freeze, Fulminiss. Throw down your weapon and I'll be merciful.
That's not going to happen!
I destroyed your avatar, and still you would go up against me?
Sel-Makor, I presume?
Sel-Makor has no physical form. Powerless without the avatar. Cannot help Fulminiss.
Betrayed. The Mystic. Rend his flesh. Kill them all. Complete the ritual! Unleash the plague!
So you're the entity that lives in the Dark Heart. Why don't you show yourself?
Sel-Makor, I presume?
Sel-Makor has no physical form. Power is channeled through avatars and minions.
If there's one thing I love, it's killing Sith!
Time to die, Fulminiss.
I don't know what kind of game you've been playing, Mystic. But after I dispatch these interlopers, I'll deal with you!
For the Emperor!
